Enclosed is our check in the amount of $29,301 for Lorillard’s
pro rata share of the second half of the 1993 budget, and
includes our 1994 Annual Dues to the Testing Laboratory.

Yours truly,

summary: The Tobacco Institute sent a check for $29,301.00 to the Testing Laboratory. The check was sent on June 10, 1994, to William A. Adams, senior vice president of the tobacco company. It was addressed to Thomas Jones, Prat Omeupment - 3736781.
